queries.querystring: SELECT is_t.TABLE_SCHEMA AS 'Schema', is_t.TABLE_NAME AS 'Name', is_t.TABLE_TYPE AS 'Type', IF(rc.TABLE_NAME IS NULL,'Local','Datamart') AS 'Source' FROM information_schema.tables AS is_t LEFT JOIN ROWCOUNT AS rc ON is_t.TABLE_NAME LIKE rc.TABLE_NAME WHERE is_t.TABLE_SCHEMA='dbnode' ORDER BY rc.TABLE_NAME -- limit 30,10
